title: Cheyenne Traditional School / Welcome to Cheyenne Traditional School
cleaned_text: Announcements - - - - - - - [New Toddler Class](/EarlyLearning) Eligible students must turn two by Aug. 31, 2023 - Upcoming Events - Tomorrow 6:00 PM [Governing Board Regular Meeting]( https://www.susd.org/site/Default.aspx?PageID=18&DomainID=12#calendar11/20230912/event/15341) - Wednesday - September 19, 2023 - September 20, 2023 6:00 PM - 7:00 PM [Arcadia | Learning Community Town Halls]( https://www.susd.org/site/Default.aspx?PageID=18&DomainID=12#calendar11/20230920/event/17154) - September 25, 2023 [View Assistant Dark Navy and Gold Mascot: Roadrunner Year Opened: 1997
